title: Solvency II extrapolation proposals feed volality debate
description: The European Insurance and Occupational Pensions Authority’s report on the long-term guarantees assessment has reignited the debate on the methodology for determining the risk-fee term structure. The authority’s proposals for a long extrapolation period have provoked robust criticism from some sections of the insurance industry and raised questions about how market volatility should best be dealt with by Solvency II. Louie Woodall reports
